ComicInfo.Title: The One, True Cross, Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary: GUEST-STARRING WITCHBLADE! The hunt for a piece of the One True Cross leads Patience and Kristof to the US, where Patience is reunited with an old friend - Sara Pezzini! Together will the Artifact bearers be able to recover the relic from Patience's newest adversary? RON MARZ (ARTIFACTS, WITCHBLADE), NELSON BLAKE II (PILOT SEASON: MURDERER) and DAVID MARQUEZ (Secret Warriors, Days Missing) continue the fan favorite series!
ComicInfo.Penciller: David Marquez,Nelson Blake II,David Marquez,Nelson Blake II
